title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.20 - Mandatory Movement Lane Control Signs (R3-5, R3-5a, R3-7, and R3-20)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.20 - Mandatory Movement Lane Control Signs (R3-5, R3-5a, R3-7, and R3-20)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraphs: Option: 00A The NYR3-21 sign (see Sign Drawing SD-R4) may be used
to identify a lane from which only U-turn movements may be made. Standard: 00B If used, the NYR3-21 sign shall be used in a manner
similar to the R3-5 and R3-5a signs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
